## Active Technologies

- 檔案系統 (backend/data 目錄,現有結構) (001-data-export-import)

- 本地檔案系統 (現有) + Google Drive API v3 (002-google-drive-storage)

- Python 3.11+ (後端), ES6+ JavaScript (前端) (001-panel-maximize)
